name: market for used purse seiner, steel | used purse seiner, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17866/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'used purse seiner, steel', in the Global geography.;This market connects the supply chain of used purse seiners, steel from the point of their generation till the place they receive their final treatment. No transportation is considered in this market as the treatment is assumed to be on the shore. Used purse seiner, steel is any purse seiner, steel reaching its end of life timeframe.

Activity starts after the production of purse seiner, steel.

Activity ends with the provision of used purse seiner, steel to its relevant consumers (treatment activities).
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
tags: Sector: Fishing & Aquaculture; Waste Treatment & Recycling

exchanges.description: EOL of a purse seiner, per 1000 kg of light ship weight (LSW), after 35 years lifetime. Regressions based on mainly primary data were created to relate the weight of each inventory item to a purse seiner's LSW. The list of inventory items (granularity) contribute >95% of environmental impacts, as described in the reference publication.
